name: AstoriaTrains
0:
”Alexa ask Astoria Trains about Manhattan bound Broadway trains”
”Alexa ask Astoria Trains when the next Queens bound 39th Ave train is”
”Alexa ask Astoria Trains next 30th Avenue South trains”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: astoria trains
des:
The Astoria Trains Alexa skill quickly tells you about the upcoming trains at any Astoria stop. Simply include the direction (North/South/Manhattan/Queens) and station (39th, 36th, Broadway, 30th, Astoria, Ditmars), and Astoria Trains will let you know when the next trains are.

Icon source: https://www.flickr.com/photos/mtaphotos/46941637171
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
